scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.update-s3-buckets: aws s3 sync ./build s3://new-jrwm3-site && aws s3 cp s3://new-jrwm3-site s3://new-jrwm3-site --exclude '*' --metadata-directive REPLACE --acl public-read --recursive && aws s3 cp s3://new-jrwm3-site --include 'index.html' --cache-control 'max-age=0'
scripts.deploy-to-s3: npm run clean-build && npm run clean-buckets && npm run update-s3-buckets
